thread.section_title: Dior US Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Dior US | dior-us.com
thread.title: Customer Judy Yocum-Ruffino
thread.title_full: Dior US reviewed by Customer Judy Yocum-Ruffino

author: Customer Judy Yocum-Ruffino
title: Customer Judy Yocum-Ruffino
text:
The make-up, skin care products, and videos work together to make this 77-year young look prettier than ever. The new Cushion make-up and the new lip and cheek product are so different from the usual. Nice surprise!
Now if Dior could only do something about my eyes
